review: Product as described. Great product from Google.
author: Asif

review: It works.  I can stream from my laptop, phone and tablet with no problem.
author: PPosey

review: Good but still there are some limitations, for instance we cannot project the whole screen. Maybe in a near future it would be better.
author: Marcello H.Ishida

review: Easy to set up and easy to use
author: Jamie

review: Item as described and shipped on time
author: William Bridges

review: Chromecast makes it convenient to run your computer off of a TV screen.  The downside?  Everything has to go through the Google Server, and it makes it difficult when you try to run something like Netflix, especially overseas via VPN.  I'd shy away from chromecast if that is something you would use it for.
author: Warren

review: This has to be the coolest device ever.  Watching everything from Youtube to Streaming TV and other video on my TV.  Just awesome.
author: codefu

review: Watch what you want. When you want. Where you want. High quality product and easy to use.
author: Jean Dautruche
